I am wondering what the absolute maximum possible amount of science obtainable is in one universe. To answer this question, one can't simply add the amount of science an initial test recieves for every biome on every planet. Repeated experiments do add more science. I am too lazy to do the math so I am hoping someone else has it figured out.

Thanks!
I have no idea what it is, but yes there is a definitely a cap aas if you do each experiment enough times it just starts giving 0 science
It's 10783. I hacked a new game to figure it out.
